data.eml:eml: First record of a fossil larva of Hemerobiidae (Neuroptera) from Baltic amber

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Makarkin, Vladimir N., Wedmann, Sonja, Weiterschan, Thomas (2012): First record of a fossil larva of Hemerobiidae (Neuroptera) from Baltic amber. Zootaxa 3417: 53-63, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281962
